overview.en: Marine environmental protection chain(MEPC) is Through the creation of consensus path and the exchange of intrinsic incentive value, the disadvantage of Internet as relay media will be corrected to produce new media.
overview.zh: Marine environmental protection chain(MEPC) 是通过共识路径的创造和内在激励价值的交换以互联网为中继媒介的劣势将获得修正产生新的媒介。
